dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
C. Stiller
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is used for evaluating depth estimation and motion prediction in autonomous driving scenarios, providing a diverse set of urban scenes with moving objects.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts
M. Omran
S. Ramos
T. Rehfeld
M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is utilized for semantic urban scene understanding, focusing on the challenges posed by dynamic objects in urban environments.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: D. Eigen
C. Puhrsch
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: The Eigen et al. Split is referenced for training and evaluation purposes, specifically for depth estimation tasks.
dcterms:title: Eigen et al. Split

dcterms:creator: M. Menze
A. Geiger
dcterms:description: The KITTI 2015 dataset is used for evaluating object scene flow, which includes depth estimation and motion prediction in dynamic scenes.
dcterms:title: KITTI 2015

dcterms:creator: T. Zhou
M. Brown
N. Snavely
D. G. Lowe
dcterms:description: The Zhou et al. dataset is referenced for unsupervised learning of depth and ego-motion from video, providing a basis for evaluating depth estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Zhou et al.
